libraries
```{r}
#install.packages("config")
install.packages()
library(DBI)
library(RCurl)
library(config)
```
Connect to DB using config file
```{r}
dw <- config::get("datawarehouse")

con <- DBI::dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(),
                 dbName = dw$database,
                 host = dw$host,
                 port = dw$post,
                 password = dw$password)
```
